+(Œ∑iŒ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)Œ±i,m]\displaystyle+(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})\alpha_{i,m}]+ ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ]
=Œ≤i,m+w~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢(Œ±m‚àíŒ≤i,m)absentsubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=\beta_{i,m}+\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})(% \alpha_{m}-\beta_{i,m})= italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )

Let Œ≤~i,m=Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±msubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëö\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}=\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Then we can further have

ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤~i+1,m|‚Ñãi]=ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤i+1,m‚àíŒ±m|‚Ñãi]ùîºdelimited-[]conditionalsubscript~ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript‚Ñãùëñùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñ1ùëöconditionalsubscriptùõºùëösubscript‚Ñãùëñ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\tilde{\beta}_{i+1,m}|\mathcal{H}_{i}]=\mathbb{E}[% \beta_{i+1,m}-\alpha_{m}|\mathcal{H}_{i}]blackboard_E [ over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = blackboard_E [ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ]
=Œ≤i,m+w~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢(Œ±m‚àíŒ≤i,m)‚àíŒ±mabsentsubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëö\displaystyle=\beta_{i,m}+\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})(% \alpha_{m}-\beta_{i,m})-\alpha_{m}= italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=Œ≤~i,m‚àíw~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,mabsentsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}-\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_% {i})\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}= over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=[1‚àíw~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)]‚Å¢Œ≤~i,m.absentdelimited-[]1subscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=[1-\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})]\tilde{\beta% }_{i,m}.= [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Note that œÜj‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚âú‚àè‚Ñì=1j[1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì+1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì)],‚âúsubscriptùúëùëóùê∞ùú∑ùú∏subscriptsuperscriptproductùëó‚Ñì1delimited-[]1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì1subscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì1subscriptùõæ‚Ñì\varphi_{j}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})\triangleq\prod^{j}_{\ell=1}[1-% \tilde{w}_{\ell+1}(\eta_{\ell}\gamma_{\ell}+1-\gamma_{\ell})],italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) ‚âú ‚àè start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] , and define œÜ0‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)=1subscriptùúë0ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏1\varphi_{0}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})=1italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) = 1. For the simplicity of presentation, let us define Œ≤^i,m‚âúŒ≤~i,mœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏).‚âúsubscript^ùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\hat{\beta}_{i,m}\triangleq\frac{\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w}% ,\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}.over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚âú divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG . Then it follows that

ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^i+1,m|‚Ñãi]ùîºdelimited-[]conditionalsubscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript‚Ñãùëñ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}|\mathcal{H}_{i}]blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] =ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤i+1,mœÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)|‚Ñãi]=ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤i+1,m|‚Ñãi]œÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)absentùîºdelimited-[]conditionalsubscriptùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏subscript‚Ñãùëñùîºdelimited-[]conditionalsubscriptùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript‚Ñãùëñsubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{\beta_{i+1,m}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{% \beta},\bm{\gamma})}|\mathcal{H}_{i}\right]=\frac{\mathbb{E}\left[\beta_{i+1,m% }|\mathcal{H}_{i}\right]}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}= blackboard_E [ divide start_ARG italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = divide start_ARG blackboard_E [ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG
=1‚àíw~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)œÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,mabsent1subscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏subscript~ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=\frac{1-\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})}{% \varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}= divide start_ARG 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=Œ≤~i,mœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)=Œ≤^i,m.absentsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏subscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=\frac{\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},% \bm{\gamma})}=\hat{\beta}_{i,m}.= divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG = over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Note that ùîº‚Å¢[|Œ≤^i,m|]‚â§1œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)<‚àû.ùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëö1subscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\mathbb{E}[|\hat{\beta}_{i,m}|]\leq\frac{1}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta% },\bm{\gamma})}<\infty.blackboard_E [ | over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | ] ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG < ‚àû . Thus Œ≤^i,msubscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\hat{\beta}_{i,m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT forms a martingale with respect to ‚Ñãisubscript‚Ñãùëñ\mathcal{H}_{i}caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. To study the convergence rate of Œ≤^i,msubscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\hat{\beta}_{i,m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, let us first check the difference between Œ≤^i+1,msubscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëö\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Œ≤^i,msubscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\hat{\beta}_{i,m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Œ≤^i+1,m‚àíŒ≤^i,msubscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}-\hat{\beta}_{i,m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

=Œ≤~i+1,m‚àí[1‚àíw~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)]‚Å¢Œ≤~i,mœÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)absentsubscript~ùõΩùëñ1ùëödelimited-[]1subscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle=\frac{\tilde{\beta}_{i+1,m}-[1-\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i% }+1-\gamma_{i})]\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{% \gamma})}= divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG

=Œ≤i+1,m‚àíŒ≤i,m+w~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,mœÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)absentsubscriptùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle=\frac{\beta_{i+1,m}-\beta_{i,m}+\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{% i}+1-\gamma_{i})\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{% \gamma})}= divide start_ARG italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG
=w~i+1‚Å¢(ùêà{Ri+1=m}‚àíŒ≤i,m)+w~i+1‚Å¢(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,mœÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)absentsubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùêàsubscriptùëÖùëñ1ùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle=\frac{\tilde{w}_{i+1}(\mathbf{I}_{\{R_{i+1}=m\}}-\beta_{i,m})+% \tilde{w}_{i+1}(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}}{\varphi_{% i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}= divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_m } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG
=w~i+1œÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢[ùêà{Ri+1=m}‚àíŒ≤i,m+(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,m].absentsubscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏delimited-[]subscriptùêàsubscriptùëÖùëñ1ùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle=\frac{\tilde{w}_{i+1}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{% \gamma})}\left[\mathbf{I}_{\{R_{i+1}=m\}}-\beta_{i,m}+(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-% \gamma_{i})\tilde{\beta}_{i,m}\right].= divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG [ bold_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_m } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] .

For simplicity of presentation, we define

bi+1‚âúw~i+1œÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢[1‚àíŒ≤i,m+(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,m],‚âúsubscriptùëèùëñ1subscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏delimited-[]1subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle b_{i+1}\triangleq\frac{\tilde{w}_{i+1}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},% \bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\left[1-\beta_{i,m}+(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})% \tilde{\beta}_{i,m}\right],italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚âú divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG [ 1 - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ,
ai+1‚âúw~i+1œÜi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢[(Œ∑i‚Å¢Œ≥i+1‚àíŒ≥i)‚Å¢Œ≤~i,m‚àíŒ≤i,m],‚âúsubscriptùëéùëñ1subscript~ùë§ùëñ1subscriptùúëùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏delimited-[]subscriptùúÇùëñsubscriptùõæùëñ1subscriptùõæùëñsubscript~ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle a_{i+1}\triangleq\frac{\tilde{w}_{i+1}}{\varphi_{i}(\mathbf{w},% \bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\left[(\eta_{i}\gamma_{i}+1-\gamma_{i})\tilde{\beta}_{% i,m}-\beta_{i,m}\right],italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚âú divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG [ ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] ,

where i=0,1,‚Ä¶,‚àûùëñ01‚Ä¶i=0,1,\dots,\inftyitalic_i = 0 , 1 , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû. Then it follows that ai+1‚â§Œ≤^i+1,m‚àíŒ≤^i,m‚â§bi+1subscriptùëéùëñ1subscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript^ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùëèùëñ1a_{i+1}\leq\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}-\hat{\beta}_{i,m}\leq b_{i+1}italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT Furthermore, we we have bi‚àíai=w~iœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏),‚àÄi‚àà‚Ñï+.formulae-sequencesubscriptùëèùëñsubscriptùëéùëñsubscript~ùë§ùëñsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏for-allùëñsubscript‚Ñïb_{i}-a_{i}=\frac{\tilde{w}_{i}}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{% \gamma})},\forall i\in\mathbb{N}_{+}.italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG , ‚àÄ italic_i ‚àà blackboard_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . Note that ùúΩ0=ùú∂subscriptùúΩ0ùú∂\bm{\theta}_{0}=\bm{\alpha}bold_italic_Œ∏ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_Œ±. This implies that ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^1,m]=0ùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩ1ùëö0\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{1,m}]=0blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0. Then we have ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^i,m]=ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^1,m]=0ùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩ1ùëö0\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i,m}]=\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{1,m}]=0blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0. Then applying the martingale concentration theory (in particular the Azuma Hoeffiding inequality) we have

‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|>œµ]=‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)]‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëöitalic-œµ‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏italic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle\mathbb{P}[|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|>\epsilon]=\mathbb{P}\left[% \frac{|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma% })}>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\right]blackboard_P [ | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > italic_œµ ] = blackboard_P [ divide start_ARG | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG ]
=‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤^i,m|>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)]absent‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöitalic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle=\mathbb{P}\left[|\hat{\beta}_{i,m}|>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1% }(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\right]= blackboard_P [ | over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG ]
‚â§2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àí2‚Å¢œµ2œÜi‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢1‚àëj=1i(bi‚àíai)2)absent22superscriptitalic-œµ2subscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏1subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëó1superscriptsubscriptùëèùëñsubscriptùëéùëñ2\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-\frac{2\epsilon^{2}}{\varphi^{2}_{i-1}(\mathbf{w% },\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}\frac{1}{\sum^{i}_{j=1}(b_{i}-a_{i})^{2}}\right)‚â§ 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG )
=2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àí2œÜi‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢1‚àëj=1iw~j2œÜj‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢œµ2)absent22subscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëñ1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏1subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëó1subscriptsuperscript~ùë§2ùëósubscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëó1ùê∞ùú∑ùú∏superscriptitalic-œµ2\displaystyle=2\exp\left(-\frac{2}{\varphi^{2}_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm% {\gamma})}\frac{1}{\sum^{i}_{j=1}\frac{\tilde{w}^{2}_{j}}{\varphi^{2}_{j-1}(% \mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})}}\epsilon^{2}\right)= 2 roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG end_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àíœïi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)‚Å¢œµ2),absent2subscriptitalic-œïùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏superscriptitalic-œµ2\displaystyle=2\exp(-\phi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})\epsilon^{2}),= 2 roman_exp ( - italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ,

This proof is then complete. ¬†

Proof of Theorem 4: First we can rewrite œïi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)subscriptitalic-œïùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\phi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) as

œïi‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùú∑,ùú∏)subscriptitalic-œïùëñùê∞ùú∑ùú∏\displaystyle\phi_{i}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\beta},\bm{\gamma})italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ≤ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) =1/(œÜi‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)2‚Å¢‚àëj=1iw~j2œÜj‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏))absent1subscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏2subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëó1subscriptsuperscript~ùë§2ùëósubscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\displaystyle=1\bigg{/}\left(\frac{\varphi^{2}_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{% \gamma})}{2}\sum^{i}_{j=1}\frac{\tilde{w}^{2}_{j}}{\varphi^{2}_{j-1}(\mathbf{w% },\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}\right)= 1 / ( divide start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG )
=1/(12‚Å¢‚àëj=1i(œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)œÜj‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏))2‚Å¢w~j2).absent112subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëó1superscriptsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùúëùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏2subscriptsuperscript~ùë§2ùëó\displaystyle=1\bigg{/}\left(\frac{1}{2}\sum^{i}_{j=1}\left(\frac{\varphi_{i-1% }(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}{\varphi_{j-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{% \gamma})}\right)^{2}\tilde{w}^{2}_{j}\right).= 1 / ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Note that we can further have

œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)œÜj‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)subscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùúëùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\displaystyle\frac{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}{\varphi_{j% -1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}divide start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG =‚àè‚Ñì=1i‚àí1[1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì+Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)]‚àè‚Ñì=1j‚àí1[1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì+Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)]absentsubscriptsuperscriptproductùëñ1‚Ñì1delimited-[]1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì11subscriptùõæ‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñìsubscriptsuperscriptproductùëó1‚Ñì1delimited-[]1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì11subscriptùõæ‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì\displaystyle=\frac{\prod^{i-1}_{\ell=1}\left[1-\tilde{w}_{\ell+1}(1-\gamma_{% \ell}+\eta_{\ell}\gamma_{\ell})\right]}{\prod^{j-1}_{\ell=1}\left[1-\tilde{w}_% {\ell+1}(1-\gamma_{\ell}+\eta_{\ell}\gamma_{\ell})\right]}= divide start_ARG ‚àè start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] end_ARG start_ARG ‚àè start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] end_ARG
=‚àèji‚àí1[1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì+Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)].absentsubscriptsuperscriptproductùëñ1ùëódelimited-[]1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì11subscriptùõæ‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì\displaystyle=\prod^{i-1}_{j}\left[1-\tilde{w}_{\ell+1}(1-\gamma_{\ell}+\eta_{% \ell}\gamma_{\ell})\right].= ‚àè start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] .

Observe that the term 1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì+Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)=1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àí(1‚àíŒ∑‚Ñì)‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì11subscriptùõæ‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì111subscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì1-\tilde{w}_{\ell+1}(1-\gamma_{\ell}+\eta_{\ell}\gamma_{\ell})=1-\tilde{w}_{% \ell+1}(1-(1-\eta_{\ell})\gamma_{\ell})1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = 1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - ( 1 - italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Thus the term 1‚àíw~‚Ñì+1‚Å¢(1‚àíŒ≥‚Ñì+Œ∑‚Ñì‚Å¢Œ≥‚Ñì)1subscript~ùë§‚Ñì11subscriptùõæ‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì1-\tilde{w}_{\ell+1}(1-\gamma_{\ell}+\eta_{\ell}\gamma_{\ell})1 - over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) is non-decreasing in Œ≥‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì\gamma_{\ell}italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and is non-increasing in Œ∑‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñì\eta_{\ell}italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)/œÜj‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)subscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùúëùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})/\varphi_{j-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{% \eta},\bm{\gamma})italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) / italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) is non-decreasing in Œ≥‚Ñìsubscriptùõæ‚Ñì\gamma_{\ell}italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and is non-increasing in Œ∑‚ÑìsubscriptùúÇ‚Ñì\eta_{\ell}italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_‚Ñì end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all ‚Ñì‚â§i‚Ñìùëñ\ell\leq iroman_‚Ñì ‚â§ italic_i. We can then conclude this theorem. ¬†

Proof of Theorem 5: Note that the number of misbehaving ratings is finite and the index of the last misbehaving rating is iksubscriptùëñùëòi_{k}italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Let us now consider ùú∑isubscriptùú∑ùëñ\bm{\beta}_{i}bold_italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i=ik+1,‚Ä¶,‚àûùëñsubscriptùëñùëò1‚Ä¶i=i_{k}+1,\ldots,\inftyitalic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû. Let Œº‚âú1/œÜik‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚âúùúá1subscriptùúësubscriptùëñùëò1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\mu\triangleq 1/\varphi_{i_{k}-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})italic_Œº ‚âú 1 / italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ). Then it follows that |ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^ik,m]|‚â§1œÜik‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)=Œº.ùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëö1subscriptùúësubscriptùëñùëò1ùê∞ùúºùú∏ùúá|\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i_{k},m}]|\leq\frac{1}{\varphi_{i_{k}-1}(\mathbf{w},% \bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}=\mu.| blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] | ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG = italic_Œº . Now we treat Œ≤^ik,msubscript^ùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëö\hat{\beta}_{i_{k},m}over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as the starting point. Note that the sequence Œ≤^i,m,‚àÄi=ik,‚Ä¶,‚àûformulae-sequencesubscript^ùõΩùëñùëöfor-allùëñsubscriptùëñùëò‚Ä¶\hat{\beta}_{i,m},\forall i=i_{k},\ldots,\inftyover^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚àÄ italic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû forms a martingale, i.e., ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^i+1,m|‚Ñãi]=Œ≤^i,mùîºdelimited-[]conditionalsubscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript‚Ñãùëñsubscript^ùõΩùëñùëö\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}|\mathcal{H}_{i}]=\hat{\beta}_{i,m}blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | caligraphic_H start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all i=ik,‚Ä¶,‚àûùëñsubscriptùëñùëò‚Ä¶i=i_{k},\ldots,\inftyitalic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû. Furthermore, the difference still holds ai+1‚â§Œ≤^i+1,m‚àíŒ≤^i,m‚â§bi+1,‚àÄi=ik,‚Ä¶,‚àû.formulae-sequencesubscriptùëéùëñ1subscript^ùõΩùëñ1ùëösubscript^ùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùëèùëñ1for-allùëñsubscriptùëñùëò‚Ä¶a_{i+1}\leq\hat{\beta}_{i+1,m}-\hat{\beta}_{i,m}\leq b_{i+1},\forall i=i_{k},% \ldots,\infty.italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚àÄ italic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû . and bi,aisubscriptùëèùëñsubscriptùëéùëñb_{i},a_{i}italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT satisfies bi‚àíai=w~iœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏),‚àÄi=ik+1,‚Ä¶,‚àû.formulae-sequencesubscriptùëèùëñsubscriptùëéùëñsubscript~ùë§ùëñsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏for-allùëñsubscriptùëñùëò1‚Ä¶b_{i}-a_{i}=\frac{\tilde{w}_{i}}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma% })},\forall i=i_{k}+1,\ldots,\infty.italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_a start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG , ‚àÄ italic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû . Note that ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^i,m]=ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤^ik,m]=Œºùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöùîºdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëöùúá\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i,m}]=\mathbb{E}[\hat{\beta}_{i_{k},m}]=\mublackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = blackboard_E [ over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = italic_Œº for all i=ik,‚Ä¶,‚àûùëñsubscriptùëñùëò‚Ä¶i=i_{k},\ldots,\inftyitalic_i = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , ‚àû. Then it follows that

‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|>œµ]=‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|œÜi‚àí1>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)]‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëöitalic-œµ‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùúëùëñ1italic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\displaystyle\mathbb{P}[|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|>\epsilon]=\mathbb{P}\left[% \frac{|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|}{\varphi_{i-1}}>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1}(% \mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}\right]blackboard_P [ | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > italic_œµ ] = blackboard_P [ divide start_ARG | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG ]
=‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤^i,m|>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)]absent‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöitalic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\displaystyle=\mathbb{P}\left[|\hat{\beta}_{i,m}|>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1% }(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}\right]= blackboard_P [ | over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG ]
‚â§‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤^i,m‚àíùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤ik,m]|>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚àí|ùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤ik,m]|]absent‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëöitalic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëö\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{P}\left[|\hat{\beta}_{i,m}-\mathbb{E}[\beta_{i_{k},m}% ]|>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}-|\mathbb{E% }[\beta_{i_{k},m}]|\right]‚â§ blackboard_P [ | over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - blackboard_E [ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] | > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG - | blackboard_E [ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] | ]
‚â§‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤^i,m‚àíùîº‚Å¢[Œ≤ik,m]|>œµœÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚àíŒº]absent‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscript^ùõΩùëñùëöùîºdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩsubscriptùëñùëòùëöitalic-œµsubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏ùúá\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{P}\left[|\hat{\beta}_{i,m}-\mathbb{E}[\beta_{i_{k},m}% ]|>\frac{\epsilon}{\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}-\mu\right]‚â§ blackboard_P [ | over^ start_ARG italic_Œ≤ end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - blackboard_E [ italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] | > divide start_ARG italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG - italic_Œº ]

Then by some algebraic operations, we have

‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|>œµ]‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëöitalic-œµ\displaystyle\mathbb{P}[|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|>\epsilon]blackboard_P [ | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > italic_œµ ]
‚â§2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àí2‚Å¢(œµ‚àíŒº‚Å¢œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏))2œÜi‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚Å¢ùêà{œµ‚Å¢œÜik‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)>œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)}‚àëj=ik+1iw~j2œÜj‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏))absent22superscriptitalic-œµùúásubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏2subscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùêàitalic-œµsubscriptùúësubscriptùëñùëò1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëósubscriptùëñùëò1subscriptsuperscript~ùë§2ùëósubscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-2\frac{(\epsilon-\mu\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm% {\eta},\bm{\gamma}))^{2}}{\varphi^{2}_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}% \frac{\mathbf{I}_{\{\epsilon\varphi_{i_{k}-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma}% )>\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})\}}}{\sum^{i}_{j=i_{k}+1}% \frac{\tilde{w}^{2}_{j}}{\varphi^{2}_{j-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})}}\right)‚â§ 2 roman_exp ( - 2 divide start_ARG ( italic_œµ - italic_Œº italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG divide start_ARG bold_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_œµ italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) > italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG end_ARG )
‚â§2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àí2‚Å¢(1‚àíŒº‚Å¢œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)/œµ)2œÜi‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚Å¢ùêà{œµ‚Å¢œÜik‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)>œÜi‚àí1‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)}‚àëj=ik+1iw~j2œÜj‚àí12‚Å¢(ùê∞,ùúº,ùú∏)‚Å¢œµ2)absent22superscript1ùúásubscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏italic-œµ2subscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùêàitalic-œµsubscriptùúësubscriptùëñùëò1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptùúëùëñ1ùê∞ùúºùú∏subscriptsuperscriptùëñùëósubscriptùëñùëò1subscriptsuperscript~ùë§2ùëósubscriptsuperscriptùúë2ùëó1ùê∞ùúºùú∏superscriptitalic-œµ2\displaystyle\leq 2\exp\left(-2\frac{(1-\mu\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},% \bm{\gamma})/\epsilon)^{2}}{\varphi^{2}_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma}% )}\frac{\mathbf{I}_{\{\epsilon\varphi_{i_{k}-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{% \gamma})>\varphi_{i-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma})\}}}{\sum^{i}_{j=i_{k}% +1}\frac{\tilde{w}^{2}_{j}}{\varphi^{2}_{j-1}(\mathbf{w},\bm{\eta},\bm{\gamma}% )}}\epsilon^{2}\right)‚â§ 2 roman_exp ( - 2 divide start_ARG ( 1 - italic_Œº italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) / italic_œµ ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG divide start_ARG bold_I start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_œµ italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) > italic_œÜ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = italic_i start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_w end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_œÜ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j - 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_w , bold_italic_Œ∑ , bold_italic_Œ≥ ) end_ARG end_ARG italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=2‚Å¢exp‚Å°(‚àíœï~i‚Å¢œµ2).absent2subscript~italic-œïùëñsuperscriptitalic-œµ2\displaystyle=2\exp(-\tilde{\phi}_{i}\epsilon^{2}).= 2 roman_exp ( - over~ start_ARG italic_œï end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

This proof is then complete. ¬†

Proof of Theorem 6: Consider the average score rule. Note that i‚â•œï‚àí1‚Å¢(M2‚Å¢(M+1)24‚Å¢œµ2‚Å¢ln‚Å°M2‚Å¢Œ¥)ùëñsuperscriptitalic-œï1superscriptùëÄ2superscriptùëÄ124superscriptitalic-œµ2ùëÄ2ùõøi\geq\phi^{-1}\left(\frac{M^{2}(M+1)^{2}}{4\epsilon^{2}}\ln\frac{M}{2\delta}\right)italic_i ‚â• italic_œï start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_M + 1 ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_œµ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG roman_ln divide start_ARG italic_M end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Œ¥ end_ARG ) implies ‚Ñô‚Å¢[|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|>2‚Å¢œµM‚Å¢(M+1)]‚â§Œ¥M.‚Ñôdelimited-[]subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëö2italic-œµùëÄùëÄ1ùõøùëÄ\mathbb{P}\left[|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|>\frac{2\epsilon}{M(M+1)}\right]\leq% \frac{\delta}{M}.blackboard_P [ | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_M + 1 ) end_ARG ] ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_Œ¥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M end_ARG . By the union bound, we have

‚Ñô‚Å¢[‚àÉm‚àà‚Ñ≥,|Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|>2‚Å¢œµM‚Å¢(M+1)]‚Ñôdelimited-[]formulae-sequenceùëö‚Ñ≥subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëö2italic-œµùëÄùëÄ1\displaystyle\mathbb{P}\left[\exists m\in\mathcal{M},|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|>% \frac{2\epsilon}{M(M+1)}\right]blackboard_P [ ‚àÉ italic_m ‚àà caligraphic_M , | italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | > divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_M + 1 ) end_ARG ]

Namely, with probability at least 1‚àíŒ¥1ùõø1-\delta1 - italic_Œ¥ we have that |Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|‚â§2‚Å¢œµM‚Å¢(M+1)subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëö2italic-œµùëÄùëÄ1|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|\leq\frac{2\epsilon}{M(M+1)}| italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | ‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_M + 1 ) end_ARG holds for all m‚àà‚Ñ≥ùëö‚Ñ≥m\in\mathcal{M}italic_m ‚àà caligraphic_M. Then with probability at least 1‚àíŒ¥1ùõø1-\delta1 - italic_Œ¥, it holds that

|A‚Å¢(ùú∑i)‚àíA‚Å¢(ùú∂)|=|‚àëm=1M(Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m)|‚â§‚àëm=1M2‚Å¢œµM‚Å¢(M+1)=œµ.ùê¥subscriptùú∑ùëñùê¥ùú∂subscriptsuperscriptùëÄùëö1subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëösubscriptsuperscriptùëÄùëö12italic-œµùëÄùëÄ1italic-œµ\displaystyle|A(\bm{\beta}_{i})-A(\bm{\alpha})|=\left|\sum^{M}_{m=1}(\beta_{i,% m}-\alpha_{m})\right|\leq\sum^{M}_{m=1}\frac{2\epsilon}{M(M+1)}=\epsilon.| italic_A ( bold_italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_A ( bold_italic_Œ± ) | = | ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) | ‚â§ ‚àë start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_M ( italic_M + 1 ) end_ARG = italic_œµ .

Now, let us consider the majority rule. With a similar proof, one can conclude that with probability at least 1‚àíŒ¥1ùõø1-\delta1 - italic_Œ¥, it holds that |Œ≤i,m‚àíŒ±m|<Œ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x‚àíŒ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2subscriptùõΩùëñùëösubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2|\beta_{i,m}-\alpha_{m}|<\frac{\alpha_{max}-\alpha_{secmax}}{2}| italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | < divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG for all m‚àà‚Ñ≥ùëö‚Ñ≥m\in\mathcal{M}italic_m ‚àà caligraphic_M. Then we have that

Œ≤i,A‚Å¢(ùú∂)>Œ±A‚Å¢(ùú∂)‚àíŒ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x‚àíŒ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2=Œ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x+Œ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2.subscriptùõΩùëñùê¥ùú∂subscriptùõºùê¥ùú∂subscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2subscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2\beta_{i,A(\bm{\alpha})}>\alpha_{A(\bm{\alpha})}-\frac{\alpha_{max}-\alpha_{% secmax}}{2}=\frac{\alpha_{max}+\alpha_{secmax}}{2}.italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_A ( bold_italic_Œ± ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_A ( bold_italic_Œ± ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG = divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG .

Consider m=A‚Å¢(ùú∂)ùëöùê¥ùú∂m=A(\bm{\alpha})italic_m = italic_A ( bold_italic_Œ± ), we have

Œ≤i,msubscriptùõΩùëñùëö\displaystyle\beta_{i,m}italic_Œ≤ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT <Œ±m+Œ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x‚àíŒ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2absentsubscriptùõºùëösubscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2\displaystyle<\alpha_{m}+\frac{\alpha_{max}-\alpha_{secmax}}{2}< italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG
‚â§Œ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x+Œ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x‚àíŒ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2absentsubscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2\displaystyle\leq\alpha_{secmax}+\frac{\alpha_{max}-\alpha_{secmax}}{2}‚â§ italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG
=Œ±m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x+Œ±s‚Å¢e‚Å¢c‚Å¢m‚Å¢a‚Å¢x2.absentsubscriptùõºùëöùëéùë•subscriptùõºùë†ùëíùëêùëöùëéùë•2\displaystyle=\frac{\alpha_{max}+\alpha_{secmax}}{2}.= divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ± start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s italic_e italic_c italic_m italic_a italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG .

Namely, the true quality is still revealed. ¬†
